scripts.ext-prod: webpack --mode development --entry ./src/extension/popup/scripts/index.js --output-filename 'popup-bundle.js' && cp dist/popup-bundle.js src/extension/popup/public && npm run inj
scripts.ext: webpack --mode development --optimize-minimize false --entry ./src/extension/popup/scripts/index.js --output-filename 'popup-bundle.js' && cp dist/popup-bundle.js src/extension/popup/public && npm run inj
scripts.inj: webpack --mode development --optimize-minimize false --entry ./src/extension/popup/scripts/mswc_uploader.js --output-filename 'mswc_uploader-bundle.js' && cp dist/mswc_uploader-bundle.js src/extension/popup/public
